updates.title: OAKMUN 2025 is Complete!
updates.text: With over 340 delegates from around the world in 10 dynamic committees, Oakridge's first international conference is complete!

updates.title: Codefest 2026 Launching Soon
updates.text: Get ready for new challenges, more innovation, and a bigger competition than ever.

updates.title: Robotics Expo Success
updates.text: Students showcased cutting-edge bots and automation projects at the annual robotics expo.

updates.title: Tech Council Initiatives
updates.text: The student tech council announced new open-source initiatives for the 2026 school year.

updates.title: Workshops Expanded
updates.text: We've added five new hands-on engineering and AI workshops based on student demand.
